channel.title: Help with 317 server please!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I'm just trying to start out coding and such and i was wondering where i could start to get a good source and good client from. I was going to see if someone could help me get started!@ Help would be much appreciated thanks!
Blackpanther0928

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @blackpanther0928 blackpanther0928
item.description:
@blackpanther0928 wrote:

im sorry im a visual learner lol could u teamspeak me? open up a notepad to talk? and stuff? im sorry i think if you explain it to me show me and then let me do it… helps more =[

i just changed it to

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m client

also changed to

C:\Program Files\Java\glassfish3\jdk7\bin

that u said and now its saying cannot find path specified… to anything i put…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“blackpanther0928, post:10, topic:418070”]okay i set it as…

TITLE Client
@echo off
cls
C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800M EGUI
pause

now… its saying couldnt find path specified…where is the path? lol in the enviromental variables? because i changed that… and its still not working…[/quote]

Try what I fixed in the quote

Read full topic

okay i set it as…

@echo off
cls
C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.7.0 -Xmx800M EGUI

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Here is an example your close

@echo off title blah. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m client pause

I also suggest you look at this for future reference

computerhope.com

Batch File Help and Support

Batch files help and information including a full list of questions and answers that help answer how to make, run, and edit batch files.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @blackpanther0928 blackpanther0928
item.description:
@blackpanther0928 wrote:

okay in the a.run it says
TITLE Client
@echo off
cls
java -Xmx800M EGUI
pause

So, does that i mean i change java-Xmx800m EGUI to java C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0 or something? just makeing sure im doing the correct thing…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“blackpanther0928, post:6, topic:418070”]okay the whole This system cant find the path specified keeps popping up when i @run it… and it keeps bring up another one when i compile it. with it saying java is not reconized or something how do i fix this… ive downloaded JDK and everything can someone just teamviewer my stuff and hopefully it will help! please?[/quote]You won’t learn if we do it for you

go to program files -> java -> look at your jdk version

now go back to your run.bat or whatever right click go to edit and change the version you see in there to the one you have in your java folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @blackpanther0928 blackpanther0928
item.description:
@blackpanther0928 wrote:

okay the whole This system cant find the path specified keeps popping up when i @run it… and it keeps bring up another one when i compile it. with it saying java is not reconized or something how do i fix this… ive downloaded JDK and everything can someone just teamviewer my stuff and hopefully it will help! please?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 server please!

item.description:

You won’t learn a lot from looking at a rsps, I suggest this

http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

item.title: Help with 317 server please!
item.dc:creator: @Vengpwe Vengpwe
item.description:
@Vengpwe wrote:

You can find servers here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html (Start with a 317, thats easy to code)

And some tutorials to help you understanding and how to code some things ex. making a tele, shop etc… : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html

And you can always post in this section again if you need some more, that you cant find in the tutorial or something, btw welcome to moparscape forums

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 server please!

Change the compiler and run .bat codes so they work on your pc and get started
gl
